x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
In dynamic work environments, professionals often struggle to maintain latest resumes that accurately reflect their skills, experiences, certifications and project contributions. Manual resume creation is time-consuming process and often fails to highlight relevant achievements tailored to specific roles, industries, and clients.
The objective is to build a Generative AI-powered system that automatically generates personalized and professional resumes by analyzing:
Employee skills Work experience and roles Projects and their contributions Certifications and learning Performance feedback and achievements
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Data and Tables -

  • Use Out-of-the-Box (OOB) Tables: User, Employee Profile, Project, Skills
  • Custom Tables / Integrations: Create custom tables for Certifications, Learnings, Achievements, Work experience, and Performance Reviews. Alternatively, integrate with existing HR systems to fetch data on demand without storing it in ServiceNow.

UI Action - Create a UI Action on the User or Employee Profile table to allow Project Managers, Resource Managers, or HR to generate resumes on demand.

Catalog Item - Create a Catalog Item to request resume generation by end users.

Notification - Send a notification with the generated resume.

Flow Designer - Build a Flow to:

Trigger resume generation using Now Assist or third-party LLMs via MCP (Model Customization Platform)

Email the resume to the user

Attach the resume to the user’s profile

Catalog item flow to ask for user's manager approval before generating resume (Optional).

Templates - Provide users with options to choose from standard resume templates.

Resume Format - Support multiple editable formats: PDF, DOCX

Gen AI Integration - Use Now Assist or integrate with third-party LLMs to generate resume content based on user data and other defined parameters like roles and industries.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Data Quality - Ensuring accurate and complete data across user profiles, projects, skills, certifications, work experience, and achievements.

Integrations - Integration with external HR systems and LMS platforms to fetch employee data in real-time.

Now Assist / Gen AI Integration - Requires access to Now Assist or third-party LLMs using MCP (Model Customization Platform) to generate resume content based on user data.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Data Quality - Inconsistent or missing data in user profiles, projects, skills, certifications, work experience, and achievements.

Integration Complexity - Connecting with external HR systems or LMS platforms may require support from different teams. Real-time data fetching without storing sensitive information in ServiceNow.

Prompt Design for Gen AI - Creating effective prompts for Now Assist or third-party LLMs to generate accurate resumes based on different criteria.

Resume Formatting - Generating resumes in editable formats (PDF, DOCX) with consistent styling and layout.

Security & Privacy - Managing access to sensitive employee data.

Licensing - Now Assist/third-party LLMs require separate licensing.
